body:
Three little birds perched on a limb
One looking toward you
Another looking towards me
One is bought to keep company
The second to sing precious melodies

The third one looked up and asked,
"Why not me?"

Three little birds perched on a limb
One looking toward you
Another looking towards me
One is bought to keep company
The second to sing precious melodies

The third one looked up and sang,
"I'll sing and keep them company."
